definition: enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery
to steam again/to rewarm food in a bamboo steamer/to withdraw currency from circulation
just out of the steamer basket 蒸籠|蒸笼/to appear (of products, publications, sometimes derog., "lots of shoddy material is appearing nowadays")
cage/trap (e.g. basket, pit or snare for catching animals)/fig. bonds (of wrong ideas)/shackles (of past misconceptions)/to trap/to shackle

sentences.english: The tiger paced up and down the cage.
The bird fluttered its wings in the cage.
Tired of watching it sitting unhappy in its cage, Ally set the bird free.
sentences.chinese: 因爲看厭了鳥兒待在籠裏不開心，艾莉把鳥兒放了。

sentences.english: There were two hens in a coop. one was fond of cackling while the other liked to keep quiet.
sentences.chinese: 籠裏養着兩隻母雞，一隻愛唱，另一隻喜靜。

sentences.english: Nightingales will not sing in a cage.
sentences.chinese: 關在籠裏的夜鶯唱不出歌來。

sentences.english: Gus in his red jacket and patent-leather boots, whip in hand, stepped to the door of the cage.
sentences.chinese: 葛斯穿著紅夾克，漆皮靴，手握長鞭，走到獸籠門前。

sentences.english: One patient developed titanium mess cage subsidence, but revision was not necessary.
sentences.chinese: 一個病人出現混亂鈦籠的下沉，但並無必要去修正。

sentences.english: Be like cage again light the dream of yarn.
It is a steamed flour food with stuffing.
sentences.chinese: 它是一種以燙麪爲皮裹餡上籠蒸熟的麪食小喫。

sentences.english: With split spherical roller bearings, the inner ring, outer ring and cage assembly are split.
sentences.chinese: 隨着分裂球面滾子軸承，內環，外環和籠集會分裂。

sentences.english: A reinforcing wire cage was dropped into the mold and concrete was then poured around it.
sentences.chinese: 鋼筋鐵絲籠放入模具中，混凝土隨即澆灌進來。

sentences.english: The monkeys bunched together in their cage.
I had to adjust to no longer feeling like an animal inside a cage.
sentences.chinese: 我得適應我不再是籠中困獸的這種感覺。

sentences.english: NIV] Can you hold him to the furrow with a harness?
sentences.chinese: 你豈能用套繩將野牛籠在犁溝之間。

sentences.english: Of grass seems to be being washed in milk, the same like a cage with a gauzy dream.
sentences.chinese: 草葉似乎在牛乳中被洗過相同，又像籠着輕紗的夢。

sentences.english: He Junfeng query director, why want to give students wear a top cage?
